title: ant
body:
<<avatar ant>>[b]Please don't bug me now[/b]... <<wait 1000>>  I am [i]quite[/i] busy at the moment.
Have you seen my crumb?
[[ yes |antcrumbyes ]] [[ no |antcrumbno ]]

title: antcrumbno
body:
Then [b]scram[/b]!
I don't have time for you...

title: antcrumbyes
body:
<<if $seenCrumb == true>>
Oh yeah? You saw it on a branch?
Did you taste it?...
<<else>>
Oh ha-ha! I can see that you are lying.
<<endif>>

title: crumb
body:
<<avatar crumb>> <<set $seenCrumb to true >> You stumbled on a giant crumb.
What would you like to do with it?
[[ taste it | eatCrumb]] [[ take it| takeCrumb]] [[ nothing |null ]]

title: eatCrumb
body: Let see <<wait 1000>>.<<wait 200>>.<<wait 200>> .<<wait 200>>these ü•® are making you thirsty...

title: Node1
body: node1= Once upon a time you<<command>>  pressed SPACE to progress to the next node. [[Answer:Node2|Node2]]

title: Node2
body: node2= <<big_boi>>2 But suddenly the small boi black box started to move! [[Answer:Node3|Node3]]

title: Node3
body: <<not_a_registered_command>> node3= But something horrible happened! All the text merged to the single text box, this is Node3. Press Space... [[Answer:Node4|Node4]]

title: Node4
body: node4 I am Node4 and I didn't get merged as I don't have a command!

title: Start

title: Start1
body:
<<avatar sign>>[color=#e90b0b]Press Z[/color] to interact with the tree critters üêúüêõüêû [color=#07a9b0]Spacebar[/color] to jump.

body: The thing is way too heavy üò¨ ....

title: cricket
body:
<<avatar cricket>> 
I am a cricket.
Would you like to me to load/save the state

[[ save it |saveState ]] 
[[ load it |loadState ]] 
[[ cancel |null ]]

title: saveState
body:
<<saveGame>>
Game stored to a GD variable

title: loadState
body:
<<loadGame>> 
game loaded from GD variable
